statements: SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM Market_Analysis;
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM Market_Analysis WHERE data_source = 'API';
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT market_id, company_name FROM Market_Analysis WHERE revenue BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT data_source, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM Market_Analysis GROUP BY data_source HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM Market_Analysis;
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Market_Analysis GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT market_share, company_name FROM MarketAnalysis ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE revenue > 100000;
SELECT * FROM DataSources;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, market_share FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE market_share BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysis JOIN DataSources ON MarketAnalysis.id = DataSources.source_id;
SELECT company_name, revenue, market_share FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE revenue > 50000 AND market_share > 0.2 ORDER BY revenue DESC, market_share ASC;
SELECT company_name, revenue, market_share FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE company_name LIKE '%Tech%' OR revenue < 50000 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_date FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE analysis_id = 5;
SELECT company_name, industry_type, revenue FROM BusinessData WHERE employees > 1000;
SELECT source_name, source_type, data_format FROM MarketSources WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_name, source_table FROM MarketAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, analysis_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(revenue) AS highest_revenue, AVG(employees) AS avg_employees FROM BusinessData;
SELECT company_name, industry_type, revenue FROM BusinessData WHERE industry_type = 'Technology' AND revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM MarketSources WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT MA.analysis_name, BD.company_name, MS.source_type FROM MarketAnalysis MA JOIN BusinessData BD ON MA.source_table = BD.company_name JOIN MarketSources MS ON MA.source_column = MS.source_type WHERE BD.revenue > 5000000 ORDER BY BD.revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_analysis;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM market_analysis ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM sales_data WHERE total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT competitor_name, strengths FROM competitor_analysis WHERE market_strategy LIKE '%digital%'
SELECT company_name, revenue, industry FROM market_analysis ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT competitor_name, strengths, weaknesses FROM competitor_analysis WHERE LENGTH(strengths) > 50;
SELECT product_name, units_sold, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, company_name, industry, market_share FROM market_analysis WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysisData WHERE revenue > 100000
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM MarketAnalysisData ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM SupplierData WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeData WHERE department = 'Sales'
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysisData ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM MarketAnalysisData WHERE market_share > 0.1 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, revenue, market_share FROM MarketAnalysisData WHERE industry='Technology' AND revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeData WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 5;
